short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly bookmark the current tab into your larder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Larder is a speedy bookmarking tool for developers at https://larder.io. This extension allows you to quickly save the current tab into your larder by using the shortcut key (default Ctrl+Shift+L in Windows, Cmd+Shift+L on Mac) or by clicking its browser button. Switch between Add and Search tabs with Alt+`.
